originContent: A sci-fi battle simulation, using Unity's ECS framework.
translatedContent: 一个科幻战斗模拟，使用Unity的ECS框架。

originContent: A video of an infinite battle can be seen [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S2RJfbJly_A).
translatedContent: 无限战斗的视频可以在[这里](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S2RJfbJly_A)观看。

originContent: ## Suggestions of what to look at:
* Different AI behaviours can be found in `Battle/AI`.
translatedContent: * 不同的AI行为可以在 `Battle/AI` 中找到。

originContent: * Combat systems are found in `Battle/Combat`. This includes different types of weapon (projectile/instant), weapon effectiveness based on range, intercepting attacks with shields.
translatedContent: * 战斗系统位于 `Battle/Combat`。包括不同类型的武器（投射物/即时），基于距离的武器效果，使用护盾拦截攻击。

originContent: * Equipment and gear are found in `Battle/Equipment`. Ships can have different equipment attached, and these can have effects like changing the speed or turn rate of ships. Equipment can be damaged and disabled when a ship is attacked, eg damaged engines result in ships being crippled.
translatedContent: * 装备和器材位于 `Battle/Equipment`。飞船可以装配不同的设备，这些设备可以影响飞船的速度或转向速度。设备在飞船被攻击时可能受损并失效，例如受损的引擎会导致飞船瘫痪。

originContent: * Universal Render Pipeline (ship shaders in shader graph)
translatedContent: * 通用渲染管线（使用Shader Graph制作飞船着色器）

originContent: This project was originally started as a way for me to practice programming in the ECS (Entity-Component-System) style, back when the Unity Entities package was still very young.
translatedContent: 该项目最初是我练习ECS（实体-组件-系统）编程风格时创建的，那时Unity Entities包还很年轻。

originContent: Since it began, there have been substantial changes to both the Unity Entities API and what is considered best practice.
translatedContent: 自那以后，Unity Entities API和最佳实践都发生了重大变化。

originContent: I've made an effort to keep things updated when I can, but given my finite amount of free time there will invariably be some places which are in need of work.
translatedContent: 我尽力在有时间时保持更新，但由于自由时间有限，仍不可避免地存在一些需要改进的地方。

originContent: So, by all means take inspiration from it, but bear in mind there may be a better way to do some things!
translatedContent: 所以，完全可以从中获得灵感，但请注意可能有更好的实现方式！

originContent: Some of the sprites are made by me, but the good looking ones were taken from [here](https://opengameart.org/content/spaceships-1) where they are accredited to [Wuhu](https://opengameart.org/users/wuhu).
translatedContent: 部分精灵图是我制作的，但那些好看的图像取自[这里](https://opengameart.org/content/spaceships-1)，作者是[Wuhu](https://opengameart.org/users/wuhu)。
